Author: Microsoft Events
Description:
Discover how Microsoft Defender for Office 365 redefines security with agentic AI, intelligent automation, and ecosystem integration. Empowering teams to detect, investigate, and respond at machine speed, outpacing threats with precision and confidence.

Chapters: 0:00 - Automated AI defense correlating multi-stage attack signals and response 00:11:41 - AI-powered SoC automation and user-submitted phishing analysis improvements 00:12:26 - Introduction of continuous learning feedback loop for improved protection 00:14:46 - Walkthrough of manual triage process and transition to AI-enhanced automation 00:19:02 - Introduction of automated AIR capability for parallel triage and remediation 00:26:19 - Introduction to mixed-mode social engineering and emerging threat actors 00:29:20 - Defender response strategies to disrupt multi-channel attacks 00:37:32 - Inline remediation and removing malicious users from compromised chats 00:38:23 - Closing the loop with posture management and custom detection rule creation
Title: AI vs AI: Protect email and collaboration tools with Microsoft Defender | BRK239
